title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday July 30, 2014
description: With Argentina on the brink of default, we take a look at how a difficult situation could get even trickier if a deal with U.S. hedge funds isn't struck soon. Plus, big urban hospitals are seeing a sharp drop in uninsured patients, which means millions in savings. But the new health care landscape has its own challenges, too.
byline: Shannon Mullen, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, D Gorenstein, Mark Garrison and Mitchell Hartman
teaser: With Argentina on the brink of default, we take a look at how a difficult situation could get even trickier if a deal with U.S. hedge funds isn't struck soon. Plus, big urban hospitals are seeing a sharp drop in uninsured patients, which means millions in savings. But the new health care landscape has its own challenges, too.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday July 30, 2014
